com.turnout.ws.controller

Class PartyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.controller.PartyController

  • @RestController
@Path(value="/")
public class PartyController
extends java.lang.Object
    PartyController class is front face for accessing and manipulating party related resources.Class and all of its method is mapped with URI path template to which the resource responds. This class is registered with jersey resource configuration, So user can access it and its method by specified URI path template. Basic CRUD operation is done like update, retrieve and search.

      An injectable constructor with dependencies as argument.

      • retrievePartyDetailsById

        @PermitAll
@GET
@Path(value="/partyDetails/partyid/{partyid}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject retrievePartyDetailsById(@PathParam(value="partyid")
                                                                              int partyid)
                                                    throws PartyNotFoundException
        This method used to get party details from database based on party id.
        Parameters:
        partyid - A integer value holds party id.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject contains party details.
        Throws:
        PartyNotFoundException - Exception thrown when entered party is not found.

@GET
@Path(value="/profile/partyid/{partyid}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject getProfileById(@PathParam(value="partyid")
                                                                       int partyid)
                                          throws PartyNotFoundException,
                                                 com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException

      • updatePartyDetailsById

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@Path(value="/updatePartyDetails")
@POST
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject updatePartyDetailsById(org.json.simple.JSONObject custdetails)
                                                  throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                         PartyNotFoundException,
                                                         CurrentPasswordNotMatchedException,
                                                         PartyNameValidateException,
                                                         PartyEmailValidateException,
                                                         PartyExistException
        This method used to update the users information into database. It will return updated party id.
        Parameters:
        custdetails - A JSONObject contains information of party.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a value of party id.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - Exception thrown when the required input parameters are empty.
        PartyNotFoundException - Exception thrown when entered party is not found.
        CurrentPasswordNotMatchedException - Exception thrown when current pass word not match with user's entered password.
        PartyNameValidateException - Exception thrown when entered party name is not valid or it may contain alpha numeric value.
        PartyEmailValidateException - Exception thrown when entered email id is not an usual format or when it may not be an valid email id.
        PartyExistException - Exception thrown when entered party is already exist in database.

      • partySearch

        @RolesAllowed(value="ADMIN")
@GET
@Path(value="/partySearch/search/{search}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONArray partySearch(@PathParam(value="search")
                                                                   java.lang.String search)
        This method used to get all the party from database and helps to search the party based on passed string. The string may have the value of first name,last name,email,mobile no.
        Parameters:
        search - A string holds a text that has to be searched.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONArray contains all the results after searching is done.
